attributes.additional_details: I believe marijuana has good impacts and is better than alcohol because marijuana has proven to help anxiety and other mental health disorders and it’s proven to make people less aggressive and alcohol does the opposite and in many religions marijuana is often used and many other countries have made it legal
attributes.background:
Set up laws that allow smoking and digesting marijuana in recreational use and set up marijuana 
dispensaries

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise recreational cannabis & release those convicted of cannabis offences.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707970
